column5: A friend of mine sent me this link and it surprises me that I didn't see it here on OFC. I didn't see it on my home forums Ohio game fishing either ..... Guy catches a world record lake trout and it means NOTHING!  Not sure what to think about it......  http://m.startribune.com/?id=247563501
This was posted, discussed and the thread was closed back in February....  http://ontariofishingcommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=73608
See how much I pay attention.........?  You should hear my wife!  " Mike! Did you hear what I said..........." .......yes dear....,..
See how much I pay attention.........?  You should hear my wife!  " Mike! Did you hear what I said..........." .......yes dear....,.. Lol them im not alone...
Well this one gives more story anyhow. Still having a hard time believing the world record through the ice is only 30 lbs, but I guess only because Lloyd released his beast in 2012!

Funniest part is that if he took a quick picture, measure and weight and sent it down to the depths he could have applied for a catch and release record and looked like a hero. Instead he looks like a fool, probably get a fine, and will likely not get the fish back to be mounted anyway.

Well this one gives more story anyhow. Still having a hard time believing the world record through the ice is only 30 lbs, but I guess only because Lloyd released his beast in 2012! WR for a tip up, I'm sure there's been bigger through the ice.
I wonder what the 4" white tube record is? lol
I wonder what the 4" white tube record is? lol Or the biggest Perch caught ?  lol.
